title: Alexander Armstrong In The Land Of The Midnight Sun 1of3 720p x2
description:
Alexander Armstrong:In the Land of the Midnight Sun

Travel Documentary hosted by Alexander Armstrong, published by ITV in 2015 - English narration 
http://docuwiki.net/images/5/57/In-the-Land-of-the-Midnight-Sun-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------

Alexander Armstrong: In the Land of the Midnight Sun
The television presenter and comedian takes on an epic 8,000-mile journey halfway around the Arctic Circle deep in mid-winter, a spectacular but deadly time of year to see the unforgiving, ice-bound region. His odyssey is full of surprises as he witnesses natural wonders and discovers the magnetic lure of the far north.


1)  Part 1 
The first edition sees Alexander begin in Scandinavia and head toward Iceland, as he swims with locals in the ocean, faces the worst storm in 25 years, and goes down the world's first major tunnel to be built into the heart of a glacier.

2)  Part 2 
The presenter continues his epic 8,000-mile journey halfway around the Arctic Circle deep in mid-winter. He embarks on the second leg of his odyssey, beginning in Iceland before travelling to the icy wilderness of Greenland. Along the way, Alexander snorkels over a vast underwater crevasse separating two continental landmasses and wrestles with a female Viking. He also joins two Danish Special Forces soldiers and their huskies, who have the loneliest job on the planet, and witnesses an array of natural wonders.

3)  Part 3 
On the third and final leg of his odyssey, he begins in Northern Canada before travelling into the icy wilderness of Alaska. Along the way, Alexander meets people who have headed north to discover adventure and seek their fortune, as well as digging for gold with modern day prospectors. He also takes on the challenge of driving up one of the deadliest roads in the world, before concluding his travels on the international dateline between America and Russia
